title: Ultimate Fantasy Battle Music Vol 1
description: 5 Original Loopable Fantasy Battle Music Tracks! All 4+ Minutes Long!
longDescription:
Asset pack courtesy of www.tabletopmusic.com! 

The soundtrack to your tabletop adventures! 


These asset packs have been created for developers who want to take their board games, RPGs and fantasy experiences off the table and into the digital world! 


These tracks and others can be previewed here: 


YouTube 


Contains 5 original loopable tracks, all minimum 4 minutes length!


1) The Final Showdown


Keywords: rock, metal, epic, boss, action, intense


2) Dimension Rift


Keywords: Intense, Dramatic, Boss Battle, Supernatural


3) Eisheth, The Underlord


Keywords: Dark, Intense, Battle, Horror, Boss, Slow, Gigantic, Lumbering


4) The Underworld Awakens!


Keywords: Fast, High Intensity, High Tension, Metal, Orchestral, Hell, Underworld


5) Blood Magic


Keywords: Crazy, Erratic, High Intensity, Fast, Wizard, Magic


Feel free to contact me Here if you have any questions or would like to inquire about original music!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 5

Number of Audio Cues: 5

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit, Stereo, WAVs

Does music loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 22 Minutes, 12 Seconds
